div.p: When I understood from Mr. Rudolf, your relative, that there is a man here to whom letters can be safely entrusted, I enclosed these, which you see, which otherwise I would not have entrusted to just anyone. You ensure that they are returned to me promptly and safely.
To the most excellent man, Mr. Johannes Schmid, the most faithful minister of the Church of Chur, a revered and most beloved lord and brother. Chur.
